EmailTemplate.description: Order Status Request - Order Not Found
EmailTemplate.name: Order Status Request - Order Not Found
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} : {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
We are unable to locate the order you have referenced.
Please provide as much of the following information as possible for further research:
Original PO document Part Number(s) PO Acknowledgement document sent by Honeywell Case # regarding this order Any email communication regarding this order
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
